name: Cartoonacy - the game of visual puns
name_original: Cartoonacy - the game of visual puns
description:
The creators of Chain of Thought have teamed up with world renowned cartoonist Mike Clelland to bring you "Cartoonacy - the Game of Visual Puns."

Each cartoon humorously depicts a common word or phrase.

Gather your friends and family and see if you can solve all the puzzles. We guarantee you'll laugh yourselves silly trying!

FEATURES:
*Humorous cartoons
*Challenging puzzles
*Game Center Leaderboard
*Need a little help? Then...
*Get a verbal hint
*Remove unused letters
*Reveal the first letter of the answer

Best wishes,
Jay & Julia Bacal
